title: Sensex Ends Flat Amid Volatile Trade, IT Stocks Lead Gains
content: The Sensex closed flat after a volatile session, led by gains in major IT stocks. Investors are eyeing the upcoming RBI meeting and global cues.

title: Rupee Closes Higher Against Dollar Ahead of GDP Data
content: The Indian rupee appreciated by 12 paise to settle at 82.50 against the US dollar on Wednesday, supported by positive domestic equities.

title: HDFC Bank Hits New High After Analyst Upgrade
content: Shares of HDFC Bank rose 3% intraday after a major brokerage revised its rating to 'Buy', citing strong fundamentals and steady earnings growth.

title: Oil Prices Ease as Demand Concerns Weigh
content: Crude oil prices fell for a second straight session as concerns over slowing global demand overshadowed supply cuts from major producers.

title: LIC Plans to Increase Stake in PSU Banks
content: Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) is looking to enhance its stake in several PSU banks as part of its strategy to support strategic disinvestment.

title: Midcap Stocks Outperform Broader Market
content: The Nifty Midcap index rose 1.2% today, led by gains in pharma and auto stocks. Analysts expect continued momentum amid strong earnings.

title: Gold Prices Decline Ahead of US Inflation Data
content: Gold prices slipped in early trade as investors remained cautious ahead of key US inflation numbers due later this week.

title: ITC Eyes FMCG Expansion With New Product Launches
content: ITC is planning a slew of new product launches in the FMCG segment as part of its growth strategy to reduce dependence on the cigarettes business.

title: SEBI Issues New Guidelines for ESG Ratings
content: SEBI has introduced new norms for ESG rating agencies to ensure transparency and consistency in evaluating sustainability factors.

title: Tata Motors Plans EV Expansion in Tier 2 Cities
content: Tata Motors announced plans to expand its EV footprint into tier-2 and tier-3 cities, banking on rising demand and improved infrastructure.
